articles.title: A Vast Stream of Flowing Stars Is Evidence of The Milky Way's Violent History - ScienceAlert
articles.description: When you go outside and look at the sky on a clear night, it seems like nothing else could be as serene and peaceful. But many of those seemingly peaceful stars are evidence of a turbulent history - and now we're learning to unlock their secrets.
